abstract: How the Paris Ritz, the former gold standard for hotel living, has fallen from grace.
snippet: How the Paris Ritz, the former gold standard for hotel living, has fallen from grace.
lead_paragraph: The marble fountain sang. The waiters moved with elegance and grace. The sun softened the sharp edges of the late October afternoon. The outdoor terrace at the Ritz was open for tea. It could have been perfect.
